trans-unit.source: Default exposure value based on Lighting Scheme
trans-unit.target: Default exposure value based on Lighting Scheme

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to get brighter highlights
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to get brighter highlights

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to get brighter midtones
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to get brighter midtones

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to get more intense colors
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to get more intense colors

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to get darker shadows
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to get darker shadows

trans-unit.source: Specify the white balance of your rendering (measured in Kelvin). Incandescent lighting: 2800K; Daylight: 6500K.
trans-unit.target: Specify the white balance of your rendering (measured in Kelvin). Incandescent lighting: 2800K; Daylight: 6500K.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to smooth out jagged edges in the rendering.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to smooth out jagged edges in the rendering.

trans-unit.source: Turn this on when sunlight coming through a curtain wall looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few places for sunlight to enter.
trans-unit.target: Turn this on when sunlight coming through a curtain wall looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few places for sunlight to enter.

trans-unit.source: Turn this on when sunlight coming through a door looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few places for sunlight to enter.
trans-unit.target: Turn this on when sunlight coming through a door looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few places for sunlight to enter.

trans-unit.source: Turn this on when sunlight coming through windows looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few or small windows.
trans-unit.target: Turn this on when sunlight coming through windows looks splotchy. This can slow down rendering, but helps for rooms with few or small windows.

trans-unit.id: indirect illumination options|indirect and sky illumination
indirect illumination options|indirect and sky illumination:tooltip
trans-unit.source: Include light that bounces off other objects, and light from the sky when calculating the lighting for this scene.
trans-unit.target: Include light that bounces off other objects, and light from the sky when calculating the lighting for this scene.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when areas of the scene that should be indirectly illuminated are left in darkness.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when areas of the scene that should be indirectly illuminated are left in darkness.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value to get more detailed indirect illumination and shadows.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value to get more detailed indirect illumination and shadows.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when the indirect illumination looks splotchy or scaly.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when the indirect illumination looks splotchy or scaly.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when the edges of objects in blurred reflections are speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when the edges of objects in blurred reflections are speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when the edges of objects seen through rough glass are speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when the edges of objects seen through rough glass are speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when objects are missing from reflections.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when objects are missing from reflections.

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when you cannot see objects through multiple panes of glass.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when you cannot see objects through multiple panes of glass.

trans-unit.source: Daylight Portal Options (only applies to sunlit interiors)
trans-unit.target: Daylight Portal Options (only applies to sunlit interiors)

trans-unit.source: Increase this value when the edges of soft shadows appear to be speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.
trans-unit.target: Increase this value when the edges of soft shadows appear to be speckled, rather than smoothly blurred.
